title: The Power of Dividend Growth
description: A quick, practical guide to The Power of Dividend Growth.

hook.text: An investor bought shares yielding 3% in 2004. By 2024, the yield on her original cost was 12%.

buildup.text: Dividend growth investing focuses on companies that raise their dividends consistently year after year.

twist.text: A 3% yield growing 10% annually doubles in seven years. Patience turns modest income into a flood.

punchline.text: Today's modest yield is tomorrow's income machine. Growth is the secret ingredient.
